review_text: I have been using meesho for more than 2 years and I am satisfied with the products received. Even though I face small issues in size of some dresses, overall looking it's so good. Just the delivery takes more time than other shopping apps. It will be good if you add more more suggestions for accessories. Overall satisfied with the product

I am extremely disappointed with the repeated failure of your delivery service. I placed an order for several items, but once again the delivery attempt was marked as "failed" even though no one rang my doorbell, and the package never reached my doorstep. This is not an isolated incident every order I have placed in the past few weeks has faced the exact same problem: delivery attempts are falsely marked as failed, no proper contact is made, and eventually the orders gets cancelled.

Worst app, literally, the worst app.You should never use it.You can actually never use it there's so cunning like what they would do if you haven't put your address in that app, they would show the product with very less price. And once you put your address there, the prices will increase drastically like twice what they were before, if somehow you order at the less price, the price which was before adding the address they wouldn't deliver it saying that it was a delivery issue with no calls.

I am extremely disappointed with the repeated failure of your delivery service. I placed an order for several items, but once again the delivery attempt was marked as ‚Äúfailed‚Äù even though no one rang my doorbell, and the package never reached my doorstep. This is not an isolated incident ‚Äî almost every order I have placed in the past few weeks has faced the exact same problem: delivery attempts are falsely marked as failed, no proper contact is made, and eventually the orders gets cancelled.

Best app for online purchases. Returns are easy and quick. I would like meesho staff to give more details about the product, like colour, size, weight, material and size chart. Many sellers have posted fake details. With this correction, I am sure many buyers from other apps will shift over to meesho. Also please add more branded products.

Meesho is a very good and outstanding shopping app. The product quality is impressive and the prices are very affordable. Delivery is fast, packaging is safe, and the return process is also easy. The app is simple to use, and there are a lot of options in clothing, accessories, home items, and more. Overall, Meesho is a great app for budget-friendly and reliable shopping. Highly recommended! 100

Meesho has become my favourite online shopping app! Prices are unbeatable, quality is reliable, and there is a huge variety of products to choose from. Delivery is fast, packaging is neat, and the return/refund process is hassle-free. What I love the most is how easy it is to track orders and shop quickly without confusion. Excellent app performance,smooth UI,and trustworthy service. Great job Meesho team‚Äîkeep it up! Highly recommended for everyone who loves budget-friendly and quality shopping.

I honestly don‚Äôt understand how Meesho is still functioning as a shopping platform. My experience has been nothing short of a nightmare. The quality of the products I received was absolutely horrible ‚Äî nothing like the pictures shown. It felt like I paid for one thing and got a completely different, cheaper version of it. Customer support was equally disappointing. Getting help was almost impossible, and when I finally did, the responses were slow, unhelpful, and robotic. The return process was

I am a regular customer of Meesho. I always do online shopping with messho. Their service and customer support is so poor. last time I placed an order with pay later option after receiving the product, I am trying to clear the dues(Rs.156/-) but it always says (please try again later) and I am getting daily whatsapp messages for due and legal process. Customer support is nothing. They clearly said we can't do anything. Meesho like this you will lose your valuable customer.

I am extremely disappointed with the service. I placed a prepaid order on 14th November, and even after many days, the delivery has been unnecessarily delayed. The tracking has been stuck for a long time, and there is no proper update from the courier or the Meesho team.Even after raising multiple complaints, the only response I receive is that the issue has been "escalated," but no real action is taken. There is no confirmed delivery date, no transparency, and no accountability from the team.

I have been using meesho for almost 2 years and ordered more than 50 times from meesho. I faced so many bad things but now it's in extreme cases because I've ordered a saree and a hotpot set from meesho. all of my items were in all issues returned but when I received the saree was very bad in quality and the hot pot set was broken. when I requested for return they kept it in under review even after 48 hours and also they removed the option of call back from my account.

Meesho Bad Experience ‚Äì Order Not Delivered I am very disappointed with Meesho because my order has not been delivered 4 to 5 times. Every time I place an order, it gets cancelled or marked as undelivered without any proper reason. This is very frustrating and unprofessional. I have wasted my time waiting for the product, and the delivery service is very poor. Meesho needs to improve their delivery system .

Overall things are good though delivery system could be better as sometimes your order gets rejected by the delivery driver only even when you were available to take order and you can't even complain about it through app. Secondary issue is that delivery dates keep postponing than expected date. Kindly look after it. Thank you for overall Good experience.

I have very bad experience with Meesho, I got a damage product and when initiated for return, they are not coming for the pick every 7 days they change the pick up dates. It's a prepaid order and neither they pick up the damage item nor refund my money. pathetic service. DON'T BUY ANYTHING FROM MEESHO. ITS A FRAUD APP. THEY ARE GIVING FAKE PROMISE. NO ONE HAS COME FOR THE PICK UP FOR 20 DAYS.

Worst experience with Meesho. Since 6 Nov I‚Äôve been following up for a simple return pickup. The pickup agent kept giving excuses, even ‚Äúforgot‚Äù to come, and Meesho wrongly marked it as customer not available. I kept calling customer care ‚Äî always told to call after 2 hours. No proper support, chat is useless. And now on 21 Nov Meesho closed the return window without picking up the product and without giving my refund. This is absolutely unacceptable and the worst service ever.

I was a regular customer of meesho. Perhaps I have ordered more then 200 products from it. Had a great experience using this e commerce platform till the recent case where a wrong product was delivered to me and on making request for exchange I again received wrong product. When I complained about it no one was there to help and they even closed my query. Now I will think 100 times before using this platform.

The worst experience ever was when I ordered a product it was delivered after 1 month and also they have given me a different product now when I returned they were showing technical issues and the delivery boy rejected the product saying that they are not accepting now when I called at call center they are saying technical issue everytime they say the same guys I was not having the option of 0 start otherwise I might have selected that option

Worst service by Meesho. My return has failed 2‚Äì3 times ‚Äî the pickup team never comes. Customer care only says ‚Äúwait‚Äù and doesn‚Äôt solve anything. Once, my refund also didn‚Äôt come. I‚Äôve been following up for 8 days, and still the return pickup is not done. I received a bigger size, and I placed the return/exchange request the same day, but there is still no update and no pickup. nothing is happening in there system.Even delivery is always delayed without any proper re

As a buyer it's avery good platform for buying products. You can return item after using it, you can return some other used item which is laying in your home for waste bin. Meesho will never ever ask you anything. The most interesting I found Candle which a non returnable item in all platform, Meesho has 7days return policy. They also showing customers free delivery but in backend adding delivery fees with the main selling price üòÑüòÑ. Meesho don't try to be act smart. We know ur strategy.

Title: Feature Request: Select Specific Item for Missing Orders Hi Team, When I order multiple products, sometimes one item is missing, but the Help section doesn‚Äôt allow me to choose the exact product to report. All items appear together with no option to select only the missing one. Please add a feature that lets users pick the specific item not delivered. I really like this app and would rate it 5 stars. Please consider this in future updates. Thank you.

I am extremely disappointed with Meesho‚Äôs overall service. The customer support is unresponsive, and the resolution process is frustratingly slow. The quality of products delivered is far below expectations, and in many cases, completely different from what was shown on the app. Refunds and returns take an unreasonable amount of time, and there is no proper communication or accountability from the support team.

Am a regular customer on meesho, have ordered many things with no issues but I was really disappointed on my recent order from meesho, was suppose to get 9 bottles from my order but to my greatest surprise I got only 3 bottles, not complete, 6 bottles not given. Meesho complete my order!!!!! otherwise I will not purchase anything from this app. Guys beware üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠.

Fraudster app , it doesn't deliver it's ordered product . I ordered a jacket 1st it was showing within a week , then extended the date and kept on doing it till I finally had to cancel . The problem was I also gave money online . My relatives and friends also warned me about this app that products delivered are not even same . Doesn't recommend it stay away from it waste of money and time .

A Dark Horse! Absolutely amazing app. If you're not concerned about quality (for example day to day life products and not clothes), Meesho can actually be a life changer. I am amazed by the products range and their affordable prices. hats off to Meesho. no matter how many memes they make about this app, this is surely a wonderful app. just go for it

I have been using this Meesho app for the past 1 year. Bought so many products for the reasonable best price. Best amazing app for those who are willing to buy premium products at low price. And also items packaging well secured and all my products are delivered early. I prefer all to use meesho app for any products.

I had a very bad experience with meesho I ordered one product but it wasn't marked as delivered several days went by it showed delivery failed and unsuccesfull when I contacted customer care they asked for invoice no. but the catch was that they needed invoice no. printed on packaging but while receiving the product there was no invoice no. so I downloaded from online they said it doesn't work. I gave all the possible prove including awb no. id no. photos of product but it did not work.. worst

I am a regular customer of Meesho. But this time surprisingly I faced an issue which was neglected by customer care. I ordered 5 items in 2 orders, and on the app it was showing it will be delivered in one shipment, when shipment was received and opened there were only 2 items. I tried connecting with customer care they said they can't do anything as the OTP was shared. They were not even listening and accepting that how come I check the products without taking the shipment and sharing the OTP.

Hello friends.... meesho is very good for some products... but too bad for some products like "fancy jewellery set for women" ..I ordered it too many times but the product status always be"ordered placed" that it...so I called customer care but they said " mam seller is not responding" ...same process is repeated from atleast 1 month....please respond meesho...I tried so many time to ordered fancy jewellery different jewellery sets.but the order is not available to deliver.please solve it.

ufff!! in my recent purchase i had very good experience with meesho!! though if was a little bit worried about the cancelation and return policy because of negative comments my recent purchase and its cancelation and return are amazing its just happened in less than 24 hrs!! make in India working as a tough competitor to foreign apps is absolutely good!! hope u keep up this way in the upcoming future!!

It has been 8 days since I placed my order, yet the product not Delivered and it is now significantly overdue. This delay is extremely inconvenient and unacceptable.I have checked the tracking status multiple times, but there is no further progress at all. The order status keeps repeating the same updates ‚Äî ‚ÄòLeft at Pune‚Äô and ‚ÄòReached at Pune‚Äô. There has been no movement beyond that. I would like to know the exact status of my order and when it will actually be delivered. I have never experience

‚ÄúI had placed an order on Meesho, and at first it showed that it would be delivered soon. But when I checked again the next day, the delivery date was suddenly changed and delayed. This is really frustrating because I was expecting it on the earlier date.‚Äù That is prepaid product.

0/5 Stars. Warning! Meesho is scamming people. I ordered an item on Meesho to claim the maximum discount on my first order. I paid online. After 7 days, they cancelled the order from their side and told me to reorder the same product ‚Äî which now costs more because I can‚Äôt use the discount again. Customer loss: 1. I lose the discount. 2. My money is stuck for a whole week. I will never order from Meesho again. Such a disgusting strategy to cheat customers.

Really the application is very helpful and makes my online shopping easier, at reasonable prices. Making online payment is one more additional benefit I am enjoying and Meesho has never failed to deliver products which are paid in advance or refund my amount if I cancel the product due to any reason.

i have using meesho more than 3yrs but last one month I'm totally disappointed and uninstalled the app. i ordered two products which i didn't like so raised a return request. but still now no one will come and pick up the products. daily i called the help centre but their response is same. and the pick up request was rescheduled daily. totally disappointed ‚òπÔ∏è

meesho, A complete fraud company and a fraud app. You are cancelling the order after reaching its destination and when it suppose to be out for delivery. After that also, you are initiating the refund of that order on-time. Even after multiple follow up, there is no response from your team

Meesho is a good shopping app but I haven't had a good experience recently. I had ordered a book series and it kept on getting delayed. And finally the order got cancelled. This is not good. One of the best platforms for daily-use items ‚Äî you get everything from the smallest essentials to bigger necessities at true manufacturer-level prices. But always make sure to check product reviews before purchasing, as they help choosing the right quality and avoid any disappointments..

recent features meesho pay later option were used for past order and I have paid the amount in my home page also it were appearing rs.0 amount. now again i were tried to buy the product using meesho pay later it were giving an error msg as "please pay your outstanding pay later dues to continue using pay later"

the overall app is great but from last two weeks I could not able to select Cod (Cash on delivery) option on any items, Soon I realized that on my other device the cod is available on same address at alternate number, the problem has started from that moment when I casually started booking my orders on online payment mode this is very ridiculous and frustrating thing I have noticed I can't able to complaint about this issue in app for this certain problem hope this issue will solve ASAP üò∂

75% are of good products.... in some cases matetial is worst.. completely different material from which is shown in the display .... products which are delivered through xpressbess never reach in time or with complete order...they always say " tried to reach but failed." such a fraud delivery partner you have

product quality is very , takes a lot of time, so it's useless.They take a lot of time and don't even reach there. If you talk to customer service, they say it will be right there. They also don't offer any solutions.So I would say don't buy from here, the product quality is bad!

My Order got cancelled 3 times in a row. Despite the prepaid order, it said pay on delivery isn't available at my area. And also the delivery time was long. Similar products are being delivered by other apps way earlier. In just 2 to 3 days. Work on it Meesho.

I am a meesho seller and messho never helps their seller if the sellers have any issue . I have raised at least 10 tickets to change my delivery partner but still they have not taken any action. so don't sell on messho my suggestion

Nice app for daily use products for the Indian working class community, but it replaces the shopping done from the local hawkers on the pavements. The worst app with worst customer service ever possible. worst experience of my life using this app 5 time in a row received wrong, incomplete or missing product. and there customer care is so bad didn't help me one with any of my problem. it's better to file a legal complaint against them. I am not going to buy anything from this app anymore and I'm also deleting my account. I highly don't recommend anyone to use this app. worst worst experience ever.

I was impressed with the affordable range at the beginning, but now I'm all disappointed. Worst experience with customer care. Meesho Scam with me.. "Beware! Meesho is a scam! Ordered a product with Pay Later, but never received it. They threaten payment, ignoring my concerns. I would rate a big Zero if it's available. worst experience at Meesho if you want to cancel order why you accept orders. My most of orders get cancelled automatically at meesho app and they don't have proper reason for that. very soon messho gonna ban permanently

Honestly, Meesho has been way better for me than Amazon lately. The prices are lower for the same products, and overall it just feels more customer-friendly. I actually stopped using Amazon because of some recent bad experiences, they don‚Äôt seem to listen anymore. Meesho has been much better so far.

I have started using this app for 20 days , I have experienced worst service from them, they keep on delay by delivery from the estimated date and when contacted the customer care , repeating the same thing continuosly, need to thing of using meesho again, worst service , filled the form twice again you are asking to fill the form, waste of time, first response to filled form , meesho waste, customer care worst service

I have ordered lid and I get the damage one, I have raised the request for replacement it's been more than one month neither replacement was done nor the refund, I called to customer support they are saying it will be refunded once pick is done and it will not pick up it auto cancelled n reschedule for next two days n this story is going on since one month, customer care pawan is not answering properly n really frustrated for refund n replacement. pathetic service dont go with mishoo. scam

prices increased when I searched for an item displayed one price , if I add an item another price, if I try to purchase another more price, fraud algorithms in their web and mobile app. I already shared bug issue and these people still did not change. I would definitely give it 0 STARS if the option will be their . It is the WORST APP I had ever found . I m really disappointed with its delivery time. Even it is in GAJIABAD FROM SINCE LAST 3 DAYS.the customer care service is also to bad . please don't waste your time in this app. REALLY A WORST APP.

I was supposed to receive 10 orders, and I waited with so much difficulty. But after 9 days, my order was automatically cancelled without any explanation. This is very disappointing and unprofessional

It was nice but all of a sudden what happened I don't know they did give proper response or didnot tell about the issue in my product My order didnot get dispatched this is third time lam ordering the same product and this time also it didnot dispatched if call them they didn't give any problem answer whether I will receive my product or not or my product will be dispatched or not I really very disappointed

Worst Experience. I didn't had account in meesho till last week. my office colleague said he want to order bike cover. so I created an account and meesho gave me 139 off on first order. so after the offer I ordered the product. And the Experience with post order made me hate the app more. After waiting 7 days order got canceled automatically and got refund in 1 day. what I hated is the service post order and also that offer got used as well. So don't give offer if it is of no use.

everything is good but the delivery time is very long like 7 day its too much and once even after 7 days my order wasn't received and then they canceled the order at last moment. i mean that's really not good to cancel at last moment. also i have noticed when you do cash on delivery they hand your parcel at your hone but when it is prepaid they are like come outside and receive your parcel seriously i noticed this behavior after many orders as iam a regular costumer of meesho.

I ordered some items from Meesho, which were already delayed. Then, two days later, when the delivery was supposed to arrive, I received a "customer unreachable" update without any contact. I even called the support center, but they just told me to wait. Meesho's service is terrible.

I ordered a dress with a promised delivery of 5-7 days, which was not met. Worse, the platform cancelled my order unilaterally without any notification or consent from me. This is highly unprofessional and a waste of time. Do not trust their delivery timelines or service guarantee. Extremely disappointed with this experience.

I don't like this app because they cancel my order without my permission.If you did not have any item or product why are you accepting my ordering request. If you don't have product you can write out of stock this product but after accepting the order when the time is delivery how can you cancel the order without my permission and once i cancel my order then they did not give me my refund back. I am extremely unhappy with Misho‚Äôs return service. I have been trying for one month to return my broken and bent product. I have called customer care 7‚Äì10 times, but still the pickup has not been done. This is very disappointing and frustrating. Please resolve this issue at the earliest.

Poor customer service. I contacted the customer helpline for a delayed shipment and I addressed I want my order on or before the expected delivery date. I again placed an order the same happened and from the customer helpline side there are no proper response and they don't question the seller's fault.

My exp with the app is good but there are many irritating things like the videos of products keep playing,even if we don't want to view them and customer support option should also be there. The products delivered are also good with grt quality for people living in a 3rd class city like Pune.

As a seller, why there is no option for asking packet opening video proof from buyers/customers... in this e-commerce there are so many fraud customers who replace the original item and returns defective item where the real owner gets defective item... For this there is no action from meesho. Why?

The service is very poor, I will not recommend Meesho to anyone. These people do not care about the customer's assurance. Meesho app is of no use, the help center only registers complaints and the help support is of no use, they have not solved my problem yet, I had ordered a prepaid product at that time It was not even delivered and when I called the customer care and told them about it, they did not even resolve it, then when I requested for cancellation on customer care, they did not resolve it, it is a terrible app.

Meesho keeps delaying almost every order without any proper update. Delivery partners don‚Äôt call, mark ‚Äúcustomer not available‚Äù even when someone is waiting, and tracking is completely useless. worst app. worst experience. fraud. I order a product on 19th of November and I paid in advance but the product didn't receive yet. it is showing that the product is stopped at one place. please do something meesho.

this app is totally fraud. when you see the price of any product here it's different but when you add it in your cart the price increases. They charge delivery fee for each product even if we are ordering many products.

fraud alert!! I‚Äôve been using Meesho for a while now and I‚Äôm honestly very happy with my experience. The app is simple to use, the variety of products is huge, and the prices are super affordable. Most of the items I ordered came exactly as shown in the pictures, and the quality was much better than I expected for the price.
